item.title: Traffic light from Christ Church Road onto Lansdown Road is only 10 seconds, 22nd April
item.description:
The light needs to be green for about another 5 seconds to stop traffic jams blocking the previous junction as seen in picture. This has been a long time now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Talbot Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
